Title: Directs the public service commission to develop, publish, and update a guidebook on the gas and electric ratemaking process
Summary: Directs the public service commission to develop, publish, and update a guidebook on the gas and electric ratemaking process to promote public understanding and participation in the gas and electric ratemaking process; facilitates the formal intervention and participation of interested or affected parties; sets forth requirements for what such guidebook shall include.
LawCode: Amd ยง66, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to directing the public service commission to develop, publish, and update a guidebook on the gas and electric ratemaking process
